review_title: Great Game but needs better movement
one_reviews_text: Fun and amazing game! Should work on movement because im really having a hard time getting around the city but overall cool game to play.
IT is so fun because you get to destoy stuff!!!

Good game so far, would love to see an endless mode with some kind of enemy in it. That would fix the main problems I have with the game which is that there is not enough content and you can only spend so long destroying inanimate objects.
Very few levels, you will complete the game in about 25 minutes, I was just sat waiting for the game to get interesting, hell give something else to destroy than inanimate objects.

review_title: Not as funny as it looks in the trailer
